title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
OB: The files in the File menu MRU list do not persist between sessions.
EB: The files should be saved in the MRU list and should appear in the list even after closing and reopening the application.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open some files.
3. Observe the files appearing in the File menu MRU list.
4. Close the application.
5. Reopen the application.
6. Verify that the previously opened files appear in the File menu MRU list again.
